 Specifies abstraction definition this bus interface references. OPTIONAL.
General::InterfaceMode interfaceMode_
 Describes further information on the mode for this interface. OPTIONAL.
bool connectionRequired_
 Specifies if the busInterface can be unconnected. OPTIONAL If false, this interface may be left unconnected. (false by default).
QList< QSharedPointer
< General::PortMap > > 		portMaps_
 Contains the mapping of the ports. OPTIONAL Describes the mapping between the abstraction definition's logical ports and components physical ports.
unsigned int bitsInLau_
 Number of data bits addressable in the bus interface. OPTIONAL Describes the number of data bits that are addressable by the LSB in the bus interface (default value 8).
General::BitSteering bitSteering_
 Is bitSteering used. OPTIONAL Does this interface have the ability to dynamically align data on different byte channels on data bus.
QMap< QString, QString > bitSteeringAttributes_
 The parameters set as attributes for the bit steering.
General::Endianness endianness_
 Indicates the endianness of the bus interface. OPTIONAL (default value little).

< Parameter > > 		parameters_

 spirit:master or spirit:mirroredMaster (one of five is mandatory) A pointer to the master instance
QSharedPointer< SlaveInterface > slave_
 spirit:slave (one of the five is mandatory) A pointer to the slave instance.
QString system_
 spirit:system or spirit:mirroredSystem (one of five is mandatory) name of the group.

struct  MonitorInterface
 Equals the spirit:monitor element in IP-Xact specification. More...

Detailed Description

Equals the spirit:busInterface element in IP-Xact specification.

BusInterface defines properties of the specific interface in a component.

Definition at line 31 of file businterface.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BusInterface::BusInterface ( QDomNode &  busInterface  ) 

The constructor.

Parameters:
busInterface A reference to a QDomNode to parse the information from.
isBus A reference to a boolean variable in Component to specify if the component is a bus or normal component.
Exception guarantee: basic
Exceptions:
Parse_error Occurs when a mandatory element is missing in this class or one of it's member classes.

void BusInterface::setInterfaceMode ( General::InterfaceMode  interfaceMode  ) 

Set the interface mode for this interface.

Note: Calling this function will erase the defined elemets that are associated with previous interface types. I.e if new interface mode is master and previous was slave then the slave settings are lost when function is called.

Parameters:
interfaceMode The interface mode

void BusInterface::setMaster ( MasterInterface *  master  ) 

Set the master element for this interface.

Calling this function will delete old master, slave, mirroredSlave, system and monitor instances. setInterfaceMode must be called after this function to define the type of the businterface as master or mirroredMaster.

Parameters:
master A pointer to the new master instance

Definition at line 857 of file businterface.cpp.

References master_, mirroredSlave_, monitor_, slave_, and system_.

void BusInterface::setMonitor ( MonitorInterface *  monitor  ) 

Set the monitor element for this interface.

Calling this function will delete old master, slave, mirroredSlave, system and monitor instances. This function changes the interfaceMode as GENERAL::MONITOR
